TopicTitle: Rocket spawns half off the launch pad and immediately falls over

Articles.Content:
Please help, it's interfering with my conquest of the solar system.

Edited September 6, 2015 by CosmicCharlie

You must center it on the circle on the floor in VAB. It spawns as off-center of the launchpad as off-center it's in VAB.

If you have problems controlling its position, e.g. it tries to get stuck in the walls and refuses to move where you want it, you can use the Offset tool on the root part to move the whole rocket in a controlled manner around VAB.
In the workshop there's a marker on the ground. Select the root part or select the whole thing which shift+click on the rocket, then move it to the center of that marker.
